title: Dogecoin Hits Multi-Month Lows as Exchange Flows Turn Bullish for First Time in 6 Months
Bitwise XRP ETF to launch Thursday, but community questions ticker
contentSnippet: Bitwise’s new XRP exchange-traded fund is set to go live when markets open on Thursday under the ticker “XRP.”

title: XRP Slumps as $2.15 Level Collapses, Bearish Structure Deepens
contentSnippet: Despite no major catalysts, broader crypto market weakness and Bitcoin's 'Death Cross' contributed to XRP's decline.

title: Trump Eyes Executive Order to Rein In Patchwork State AI Policies
contentSnippet: The White House is pushing for a federal framework as Hill Republicans explore attaching a moratorium to the defense bill.

title: Bitcoin’s drawdown shouldn’t be blamed on US shutdown or AI: Analysts
contentSnippet: An onchain analyst said every time Bitcoin has seen a plunge like this, it has “allowed us to move higher.”

title: 1 in 3 young investors switched advisers over crypto access: Survey
contentSnippet: Young and rich investors want wealth advisers to offer crypto, and some have moved their money from those who don’t, according to a survey by Zerohash.

title: ビットワイズのXRP ETFが米国で上場へ　カナリーに次ぐ2つ目の現物型商品
contentSnippet: ビットワイズのXRP現物ETFがNYSEに上場へ。欧州GXRPに続く2本目のXRP商品で、米国では初提供。XRPCの初日取引高90億円超など、アルトETF市場が急拡大している。

title: Cloudflare outage shows why crypto needs end-to-end decentralization
contentSnippet: Many blockchains are decentralized, but their frontends and storage still rely on Web2 — a weakness exposed when the Cloudflare outage knocked several platforms offline, EthStorage said.

title: ビットコイン9万ドル回復、エヌビディア好決算で投資家心理改善　マイナー売り圧に変化の兆しも
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨市況暗号資産（仮想通貨）市場では、ビットコイン（BTC）は前日比+3.4%の1BTC=92,331ドルに。BTC/USD日足20日にかけて、88,000ドル付近から92,000ドル超まで回復した。この反発は、エヌビディアが発表した第...

title: Ripple Weighs Staking Overhaul to Expand XRP’s Role in DeFi
contentSnippet: Ripple is exploring whether native staking could enhance the XRP Ledger’s security and utility without compromising its core consensus model.

title: ブロック社が強気の財務見通し、3年で粗利益2.5兆円目指す　 自社株買いも発表
contentSnippet: ジャック・ドーシー率いるブロック社が今後3年の財務見通しを発表。粗利益の年間15億ドル増加を予想し、株価が7.6%上昇した。AI・仮想通貨事業も強化している。

title: Bitcoin whale activity on track for its biggest week this year: Analysts
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s slide below $90,000 is drawing whales back in, with Santiment analysts saying this could be their busiest week of 2025 as accumulation ticks up.

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Market Turns Defensive as Bitcoin Loses Its Bid
contentSnippet: With CryptoQuant flagging an exhausted demand wave and Polymarket traders clustering around an 85,000 retest, the market is trading without the catalysts that drove last year’s gains.

title: Warning: WhatsApp worm targets Brazilian crypto wallets, bank accounts
contentSnippet: Alert: A WhatsApp worm is spreading a banking trojan in Brazil, targeting crypto wallets and financial logins.

title: Samourai Wallet CTO William Hill Sentenced to Four Years in Prison
contentSnippet: The developer will serve 48 months for running an unlicensed money transmitter, after his co-founder received five years earlier this month.

title: Abu Dhabi Investment Council triples stake in Bitcoin ETF in Q3: Report
contentSnippet: BlackRock’s spot Bitcoin ETF share price is down almost 23% since the end of the third quarter.

title: Circle, Bitcoin Treasuries Lead Crypto Stock Losses Amid Bitcoin Headwinds
contentSnippet: Digital asset-focused stocks fell on Wednesday as Bitcoin and other major cryptocurrencies extended losses, even as tech stocks steadied.

title: 米大手仮想通貨取引所コインベース、予測市場・株式取引機能を導入か
contentSnippet: 米コインベースが12月17日に「新時代」を発表予定。リーク情報から予測市場・株式取引機能の実装が示唆され、カルシとの提携深化やブロックチェーン株式取引の展開が期待される。

title: NASA Insists Interstellar Visitor Is ‘Just a Comet’ as Public Speculation Lingers
contentSnippet: Agency officials said data showed nothing unusual about Comet 3I Atlas despite weeks of speculation.

title: Crypto, tech stocks climb on Nvidia’s blowout Q3 earnings
contentSnippet: Nvidia has posted a record quarterly revenue, which has helped dampen fears of an AI bubble and lift crypto and tech stocks.

title: BlackRock Forms New Trust Amid Early Uptake of Staking-Focused Ethereum ETFs
contentSnippet: BlackRock’s new trust adds momentum to a growing push among issuers to bring staking-enabled Ethereum products into U.S. markets.

title: 仮想通貨XRPにステーキング導入案が浮上　実用性向上の方法を模索
contentSnippet: RippleXのエンジニアリング部門のトップは、仮想通貨XRPへのステーキング機能導入を考察していると説明。ステーキングは報酬が発生する仕組みであり、投資家からも注目を集めている。

title: BlackRock signals it is working on a new staked Ethereum trust ETF
contentSnippet: BlackRock is now pursuing a new staked Ethereum ETF, offering more lucrative returns, approximately 15 months after launching its flagship ETH fund, ETHA.

title: 「銀行の仮想通貨保有について、基準見直す必要性がある」バーゼル委員会議長
contentSnippet: バーゼル委員会議長がステーブルコインの台頭を背景に、銀行の仮想通貨保有規制の見直しが必要だと発言した。現行の厳格な資本要件の緩和が焦点となっている。

title: Bitcoin futures traders refuse to capitulate even as BTC price drop to $89K
contentSnippet: Bitcoin derivatives remain stable despite BTC revisiting the $89,000 level. Is the futures market’s resilience an early hint that traders expect a price reversal?

title: Stablecoin Spending Goes Mainstream With Opera MiniPay’s LatAm Integration
contentSnippet: The feature connects USDT balances to PIX and Mercado Pago, enabling users to pay with QR codes and converting to local currency instantly.

title: Pro-Crypto CFTC Chair Nominee Won’t Commit to More Agency Resources or Dem Commissioners
contentSnippet: During a Senate confirmation hearing, Mike Selig declined to say the CFTC needs more resources to regulate crypto—despite bipartisan support on the issue.

title: New XRP and Dogecoin ETFs Expected to Begin Trading in the Coming Days
contentSnippet: New ETFs separately tracking XRP and Dogecoin could debut in the next three trading days, according to analysts.

title: Samourai Wallet Co-Founder Bill Hill Sentenced to 4 Years in Prison for Unlicensed Money Transmitting
contentSnippet: The 67-year-old Hill’s recent autism diagnosis, as well as his advanced age, seemed to serve as mitigating factors for the sentencing judge.

title: Cancer Diagnosis Helps Keep Jack Abramoff Out of Prison for 'AML Bitcoin' Fraud Scheme
contentSnippet: Disgraced lobbyist Jack Abramoff gets probation for crypto fraud, but must repay $2.2 million to victims of his bogus AML Bitcoin scheme.

title: 「ビットコインとはサービスである」下落相場の中でBitwise幹部が価値の本質を指摘
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨運用企業Bitwiseの最高投資責任者は、ビットコインはサービスであるとの見方を示した。マイクロソフトと比較しながら、価値の本質を説明している。

title: Nvidia Earnings Beat, Strong Outlook Calm Jittery Markets; Bitcoin Re-Takes $90K
contentSnippet: "Blackwell sales are off the charts, and cloud GPUs are sold out," said Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang.

title: Coinbase Teases 'New Era' Amid Prediction Market, Stock Trading Leaks
contentSnippet: Coinbase did not deny leaks of a future prediction market integration and stock trading feature, teasing a "new era" for the crypto platform.

title: DeFi Giant Spark Shelves Crypto App Plans to Focus on Institutional Infrastructure
contentSnippet: The protocol will instead focus on "liquidity infrastructure and deals" such as its recent $1 billion investment into PayPal's PYUSD.

title: Trump's Pick to Run CFTC, Selig, Tells Senators Crypto a 'Critical Mission' at Agency
contentSnippet: Mike Selig, the nominee to be the next chairman of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, testified at his confirmation hearing in the Senate.

title: Fed Rate Cut Odds Plunge Further on Jobs Data Delays
contentSnippet: Traders slash chances of a December cut to 33% as the Fed loses a key data point ahead of its final 2025 meeting.

title: New Hampshire Awaits Bitcoin Bond Buyer to Get First State Effort Rolling
contentSnippet: The New Hampshire Business Finance Authority took the opening steps toward shepherding a potential $100 million private-sector bitcoin bond.

title: ストラテジーのセイラー会長、ウォール街参入による「ビットコイン弱体化」論を否定
contentSnippet: ストラテジーのセイラー会長がフォックス・ビジネスで、機関投資家の参入によりビットコインのボラティリティが大幅に低下していると発言した。2020年の約80%から現在50%まで縮小し、今後はS&P500の1.5倍程度に収束すると予測している。

title: アーク・インベスト、コインベースとサークル株を買い増し
contentSnippet: ARK投資のキャシー・ウッド氏、コインベースとサークル株を計720万ドル購入。ステーブルコイン市場の成長を見据え、仮想通貨関連株への投資を拡大。

title: ブラジル、仮想通貨のクロスボーダー決済に課税検討　規制強化で抜け穴封じ＝報道
contentSnippet: ブラジル政府が仮想通貨を利用したクロスボーダー決済への課税を検討している。中央銀行は2026年2月から新規制を施行し、ステーブルコインを含む国際送金を外為取引として扱う方針だが、税収漏れ対策として金融取引税（IOF）の対象とする案が浮上している。
